title: 157. Overgrown Passage
content:
You open the pouch of spores and, with a gentle puff of breath, blow them towards the vines. The reaction is almost instantaneous. The vines shiver and recoil from the spores, revealing a previously unseen passageway.

You can travel from this location along routes locked by the   icon. Discard all   from Overgrown Passage and attach it facedown to the current location as a reminder. When you travel, return Overgrown Passage to the general set.
